name: How to Cringe Christmas - Team 3 Unreal Jam
name_original: How to Cringe Christmas - Team 3 Unreal Jam
description:
Welcome to How to Cringe Christmas, a game where you have to be the jerk who hates Christmas.

It's a game where you have to steal and sabotage a list of items in a given time, we are in a 3D environment made Unreal during a three-day jam with the theme of Christmas and more precisely the movie How the Grinch Stole Christmas!You have a limited amount of time to ruin as much as possible this little Christmas village while dodging the little elf guards !

Steal and vandalize all the objects you can.To move - ZQSD (french keyboard)

To pick items - E

To activate super jump - C

To  jump - space bar

To hit - left clicDevelopped by : Benjamin CHARIOU • Bastien BARNÉOUD-CHAPELIER • Morigan LETOURNEAU • Macéo PRÉVOST

Designed by : Simon DIALINAS • Amir ALOTOUNOU

Graphics by : Lucas RASSON • Hugo DOBRENEL

Produced by : Théophile COURATIER
